blackengine.openGL.texture

Class TextureAtlas

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.openGL.texture.TextureAtlas

  • public class TextureAtlas
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of this class represents a texture that is divided into multiple images. The images are divided into rows and columns within the single texture. Using the index property of this atlas, the renderer can know which of these images should be used for rendering.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextureAtlas(Texture texture, int rows, int columns, float index)
      Default constructor for creating a new texture atlas.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextureAtlas

        public TextureAtlas(Texture texture,
                    int rows,
                    int columns,
                    float index)
        Default constructor for creating a new texture atlas.
        Parameters:
        texture - The texture.
        rows - The number of rows in the texture atlas.
        columns - The number of columns in the texture atlas.
        index - The chosen index that will be used for rendering.

    • Method Detail

      • getTexture

        public Texture getTexture()
        Getter for the texture.
        Returns:
        An instance of Texture representing a texture that is loaded into OpenGL.

      • getRows

        public int getRows()
        Getter for the number of rows in the texture atlas.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the number of rows in the texture atlas.

      • getColumns

        public int getColumns()
        Getter for the number of columns in the texture atlas.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the number of columns in the texture atlas.

      • getIndex

        public float getIndex()
        The index of the selected image from the atlas.
        Returns:
        A float referencing the index of the selected image. Any value between whole integers represents a blend between the two images.

      • setIndex

        public void setIndex(float index)
        Setter for the selected index.
        Parameters:
        index - a float representing the index of the image used.
